subject: Re: [junit] JUnit 4 article published
msgSnippet: #: Ilja Preuss changed the world a bit at a time by saying on  9/15/2005 1:32 PM :# ... Sure, nobody can say that you can compare JUnit being on market for at
messageBody:
#: Ilja Preuss changed the world a bit at a time by saying on 9/15/2005 1:32 PM :#
>> Is it a big problem to install a plugin?
>
> No. But having to do so versus not having to do so is an indicator for

>
> Cheers, Ilja
>

Sure, nobody can say that you can compare JUnit being on market for at least 4 years with TestNG
which is only 1 year old.

:alex |.::the_mindstorm::.|
